item.title: Talk
item.description: Writing a Platformer in HTML5 JavaScript by Jason Pruim WHEN: February 20 at 3:00pm LOCATION: ONLINE at https://teams.microsoft.com/l/team/19%3a1a0644a74b5848b3b9ed538b4b9f8a91%40thread.tacv2/conversations?groupId=22ff6955-36d1-49b0-84fd-f3eaa8292170&tenantId=756349b9-0610-4b01-917b-2a4ac10df947 Details [ to come ] Talk Resources https://github.com/Calvin-Abstraction/html5-games

item.title: Self Promotion
item.description: Are you a Calvin student with a project you would like to promote? Contact us if you think it’ll benefit others to share. We don’t guarantee to list you project, but if we do you’ll find it here.
